titles.title: In this Desert Called the World

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In this desert called the world
I will walk both day and night
With the guidance of your Spirit
I will walk with a joyful heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will walk with love
I will walk with your Spirit
I will walk with pleasure
With you by my side (through eternity)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
On this path that we call life
I will walk on rocky ground
With you, Jesus, in my heart
I will walk without fear
